description: This file defines a React component named 'App' that manages a theme state ('light' or 'dark') and provides a toggle button to switch themes. It also includes UI elements like a logo, instructions, and a link.

methods.name: App
methods.description: React functional component that manages theme state and renders UI elements including a toggle button.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Function to switch the theme between 'light' and 'dark'.
